**Tender Notice: Request for Proposal (RFP)** 

**Title:** W0107-245416 Air Brakes Board RFP EN / W0107-245416 Panneau de formation sur les freins pneumatiques DDP FR
**Reference Number:** WS4392137913-Doc4392199643
**Publication Date:** January 12, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** January 30, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

**Introduction**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites offers from suppliers to provide and deliver instructional Air Brakes Board to the Department of National Defence (DND), Garrison Petawawa.

**Scope of Work**

The requested goods and services are: Truck tractors, Pneumatic machinery and equipment, Air fittings and connectors, Pneumatic cylinders and components.

**Tender Conditions**

* The tender is open to all qualified suppliers.
* The selection criteria are based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* Bids must be submitted electronically through Ariba Discovery.
* The closing time for bid submissions has been extended to January 30, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST.

**Important Instructions**

Please note that all required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted by the tender closing date and time to avoid being declared non-responsive. Offers received after the closing time will not be considered.

**Contact Information**

For any questions or inquiries, please contact:
Darlene Keenan, PSPC/SPAC
darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL**

The detailed notice can be found on the Ariba Discovery website:
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18501662?extsite=MTg1MDE2NjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Language of Tender**

This RFP is issued in both English and French.
The successful supplier will be required to provide goods and services in accordance with Canadian laws and regulations.

**Closing**
